formattedAddress: 267-275 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 267-275 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA

editorialSummary.text: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

originalText.text: The worst experience I've had at a Starbucks. I'm 7 months pregnant, and it's not easy to hold it when you need to use the restroom. I kindly asked the manager, Gaige, if I could use the bathroom for a moment because I was about to burst, and it was the only one open nearby. He said no, even though I had ordered coffee to be a customer. He claimed it was only for employees, and when I explained my situation, showing my belly, he said it wasn't his problem. What a mess of people you hire to work at Starbucks, without any empathy. A huge disappointment.

text.text: The worst experience I've had at a Starbucks. I'm 7 months pregnant, and it's not easy to hold it when you need to use the restroom. I kindly asked the manager, Gaige, if I could use the bathroom for a moment because I was about to burst, and it was the only one open nearby. He said no, even though I had ordered coffee to be a customer. He claimed it was only for employees, and when I explained my situation, showing my belly, he said it wasn't his problem. What a mess of people you hire to work at Starbucks, without any empathy. A huge disappointment.

originalText.text:
This Starbucks opens at 6:00 AM, and in my opinion if they are open they should have their products ready to be served. The last few times I went in at either 6:00 AM on the dot or a bit after, seeing as I work two blocks away and start work early, I was told, "We're running a little behind today." Yesterday they had no hot coffee ready to be served, but I wanted iced coffee, which they had but did not seem happy about serving me, and today, AFTER charging me for a large iced coffee the manager told me the coffee for iced coffee had not been brewed yet. I demanded a refund, which he gave me, and told him this was the second day in a row I encountered this problem. His unprofessional response to me was a dumb looking smirk/smile on his face. The staff at this Starbucks in the early morning hours really need to get their acts together. I am glad there is a Dunkin' near by...
Update from 11/25/2023: Went to this Starbucks this morning at 6:10 AM and the door was locked yet the staff was in there. I knocked on the door and the manager came to open it, only to tell me, "We're running a little behind today and nothing is ready yet." I quickly told her that this was the third time I had been told this when coming to this Starbucks. She looked at me as if I had said something shocking to her. Her next response to me was, "Well, its the day after Thanksgiving." I have no idea how a manager can offer such an asinine excuse for not having their business open at the correct  time. This is the same manager who ran late one morning in getting to work, and the entire staff was stuck waiting outside because she had the keys for access. I have said it before, this Starbucks really needs to get their act together,

originalText.text: I wish I knew this great Barista name ! He is amazing- I always Order Americano via mobile - not only my coffee always ☕️ taste amazing but his personality and friendliness when I picked !! He is the Best !

originalText.text: I go to this Starbucks frequently and they are always friendly and the service is quick.  The baristas always make the drinks to perfection! My favorite here is the caramel frappuccino. They have mobile order but no parking structure.

text.text: I go to this Starbucks frequently and they are always friendly and the service is quick.  The baristas always make the drinks to perfection! My favorite here is the caramel frappuccino. They have mobile order but no parking structure.

originalText.text: Staff is unwelcoming. Loud unprofessional music. When I asked for a knife to spread my butter on my bagel I was looked at as if I had 2 heads on my shoulders. Wait for mobile order was long. Definitely under staffed
